title: Controlling a MeArm robot arm using Golang and Google Assistant
description: Demo project on how to run a Golang program on an embbeded hardware like Raspberry/Orange Pi. In this case this project works as a controller for a MeArm robot arm that can be controlled by voice using Google Assistant.

title: Weather station using - Golang + IoT + OpenCensus Tracing and Reporting
description: Demo project on how to run a Golang program on an embbeded hardware like Onion Omega 2 or Raspberry Pi. In this case this project works as a basic Weather Station with some sensors and sends the data using OpenCensus library to provide metrics and tracking of the device.

title: How to talk with plants using IoT and Actions on Google.
description: This project will teach you how to talk with plants using IoT and Actions on Google.

title: Bad Smell Detector Gcloud Flutter
description: Bad Smell detector using Arduino, Google Cloud IoT Core, Python Cloud Functions and Flutter App

title: AI Candy Dispenser
description: A Candy Dispenser using Android Things + TensorFlow

title: Asset Tracker using Cloud IoT Core + GPS + GSM
description: An Asset Tracker made with an ESP32 running MongooseOS + GPS and GPRS Module, sending data through Google Cloud IoT Core

title: Weather Station using MongooseOS and Google Cloud
description: A Weather station made with an ESP32, sending data through Google Cloud IoT Core and storing in BigQuery

title: PokeTrainers
description: A Progressive Web App that helps players on Pokemon GO mobile game (Not updated anymore).

title: Packtpub Notifier
description: Application that notifies when a new book is free on PacktPub. Backend in NodeJS, Apps in React Native and Alexa integration. All running on google cloud platform. Native app made with React Native.

title: WebUSB + Arduino
description: Physical Led Ring controlled via a Browser - A WebUSB and Arduino experiment.

title: Onion Omega 2 + Golang
description: Code for the tutorial on how to get started with Golang and Onion Omega

title: BH1750 Android Things Driver
description: Android Things driver for BH1750 ambient light sensor

title: WebBluetooth + Arduino + React
description: Experiment using a MeArm robot arm, an Arduino and a bluetooth LE module, connecting it to the browser using WebBluetooth.

title: Facebook Followers Counter with ESP8266
description: Projeto bem interessante para iniciantes e que pode ser alterado para sua p√°gina.
